6.2 Do levels of resources relate to rates of improvement?
Estimates of changes in preschool children’s underweight prevalences were calculated for 
11 of the programmes examined (see last column of Table II-1) where both outcome results 
(underweight change) and resources (intensity as CHNWs/1000, and US$/child per year) were 
available.
